stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Site Reliability Engineering enthusiasts... It's almost time for SREday in London! From September 14th to 15th, a 48-hour tech journey awaits you. Book your tickets now!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Site Reliability Engineering enthusiasts... It's almost time for SREday in London! From September 14th to 15th, a 48-hour tech journey awaits you. Book your tickets now! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: From stem cells to embryos
stories.Description: A milestone in biology has been achieved in Israel with the development of synthetic, human-like embryos, offering new perspectives on pregnancy and potential breakthroughs in organ transplantation.
stories.Tweet: From stem cells to embryos 📦 A milestone in biology has been achieved in Israel with the development of synthetic, human-like embryos, offering new perspectives on pregnancy and potential breakthroughs in organ transplantation. #science https://gizmodo.com/scientists-grow-a-whole-human-embryo-model-from-scratch-1850812525

stories.Title: The power of the worm
stories.Description: GE Aerospace has introduced Sensiworm, an innovative method that could change aerospace maintenance. This soft robotic worm is designed to inspect jet engines without disassembling them.
stories.Tweet: The power of the worm 📦 GE Aerospace has introduced Sensiworm, an innovative method that could change aerospace maintenance. This soft robotic worm is designed to inspect jet engines without disassembling them. #robotics https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/ge-sensiworm-aerospace-maintenance

stories.Title: Tech giants for Arm
stories.Description: Amidst chip industry expansion, Intel has taken a strategic approach. The company has joined the growing list of Arm investors, hoping to diversify its chip portfolio.
stories.Tweet: Tech giants for Arm 📦 Amidst chip industry expansion, Intel has taken a strategic approach. The company has joined the growing list of Arm investors, hoping to diversify its chip portfolio. #intel https://www.engadget.com/intel-joins-apple-alphabet-and-samsung-as-an-arm-investor-120115199.html

stories.Title: Let's keep the Pro
stories.Description: Although multiple rumors suggested that this year's Apple event would include a new name for the iPhone 15, it seems that all the "Ultra" buzz is over.
stories.Tweet: Let's keep the Pro 📦 Although multiple rumors suggested that this year's Apple event would include a new name for the iPhone 15, it seems that all the "Ultra" buzz is over. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/09/08/iphone-15-ultra-pro-max-rumors/

stories.Title: India's AI landscape expands
stories.Description: Nvidia and Reliance Industries have partnered in India to develop AI infrastructure and local language models, with the goal of empowering researchers, startups, and experts nationwide.
stories.Tweet: India's AI landscape expands 📦 Nvidia and Reliance Industries have partnered in India to develop AI infrastructure and local language models, with the goal of empowering researchers, startups, and experts nationwide. #nvidia https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/08/reliance-nvidia-india/

stories.Title: We need multilingual AI
stories.Description: Most models are trained with English and Chinese data. However, as AI continues to evolve and more countries embrace this technology, there is a growing need to overcome language barriers.
stories.Tweet: We need multilingual AI 📦 Most models are trained with English and Chinese data. However, as AI continues to evolve and more countries embrace this technology, there is a growing need to overcome language barriers. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/09/08/ai-language-gap-chatgpt

stories.Title: Not so fast, SpaceX
stories.Description: Starship's next journey is currently on hold, despite its readiness. The FAA has outlined 63 actions that SpaceX must address before resuming launches.
stories.Tweet: Not so fast, SpaceX 📦 Starship's next journey is currently on hold, despite its readiness. The FAA has outlined 63 actions that SpaceX must address before resuming launches. #spacex https://www.theverge.com/2023/9/8/23864393/spacex-starship-orbital-flight-test-faa-hold

stories.Title: Tourism at the final frontier
stories.Description: Virgin Galactic successfully launched its third commercial spaceflight today. Three crew members made it into space after purchasing tickets in 2005.
stories.Tweet: Tourism at the final frontier 📦 Virgin Galactic successfully launched its third commercial spaceflight today. Three crew members made it into space after purchasing tickets in 2005. #virgingalactic https://www.space.com/virgin-galactic-third-commercial-spaceflight-preview

stories.Title: Lotus presents Emeya
stories.Description: Lotus Cars has introduced a stunning vehicle to the electric market. Emeya, a 4-door hyper-GT, has been turning heads since its unveiling in New York City.
stories.Tweet: Lotus presents Emeya 📦 Lotus Cars has introduced a stunning vehicle to the electric market. Emeya, a 4-door hyper-GT, has been turning heads since its unveiling in New York City. #EVs https://electrek.co/2023/09/07/lotus-unveils-electric-emeya-first-4-door-hyper-gt/

stories.Title: Range anxiety is not our guest
stories.Description: Hilton and Tesla have struck a deal to deploy 20,000 Tesla Universal Wall Connectors across the company's properties in North America, making EV charging more accessible to travelers.
stories.Tweet: Range anxiety is not our guest 📦 Hilton and Tesla have struck a deal to deploy 20,000 Tesla Universal Wall Connectors across the company's properties in North America, making EV charging more accessible to travelers. #tesla https://www.engadget.com/tesla-is-installing-20000-chargers-across-hilton-properties-in-north-america-090753306.html

title: The future of medicine, Starship is on hold, iPhone 15 Sticks with "Pro"
description: A remarkable milestone that advances our understanding of human development is unfolding in Israel as researchers have successfully grown synthetic embryos. We were all looking forward to seeing Starship in all its glory, but SpaceX has 63 things to address first. And finally, just as I was getting used to the idea of the "iPhone 15 Ultra," Apple decided to change its plans.
